Expression.Sql: SELECT A.USER_ID,A.OBJCLASS,A.TITLE,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATE_DATE,A.CREATE_USERID,A.TOTAL_MONEY, U.NAME AS CREAT_PERSON FROM FILE_INFOS A LEFT JOIN USER_INFO U ON A.USER_ID = U.ID WHERE A.ID = ?

Action.name: 查询流程相关人员
Action.next: 查询当前流程节点相关人员

Expression.Sql:
SELECT A.USER_ID,A.ACTNAME,B.NAME FROM ( SELECT USER_ID,ACTNAME FROM FILE_NODES WHERE INFO_ID = ? AND (USER_ID != '' AND USER_ID IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY USER_ID,ACTNAME) A LEFT JOIN USER_INFO B ON A.USER_ID = B.ID
UNION
SELECT B.ID AS USER_ID,A.ACTNAME,B.NAME FROM USER_INFO B RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT ROLE_ID,ACTNAME FROM FILE_NODES WHERE INFO_ID = ? AND (USER_ID = '' OR USER_ID IS NULL) GROUP BY ROLE_ID,ACTNAME) A ON INSTR(B.ROLEIDS,A.ROLE_ID)>0 WHERE B.ID NOT IN (SELECT MANAGER_ID FROM COMPANY_INFO WHERE ID = ? ) AND B.COMPANY_ID = ?

Action.name: 查询当前流程节点相关人员

Expression.Sql:
SELECT A.USER_ID FROM ( SELECT USER_ID FROM FILE_INBOX WHERE INFO_ID = ? AND (USER_ID != '' AND USER_ID IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY USER_ID) A LEFT JOIN USER_INFO B ON A.USER_ID = B.ID
UNION
SELECT B.ID AS USER_ID FROM USER_INFO B RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM FILE_INBOX WHERE INFO_ID = ? AND (USER_ID = '' OR USER_ID IS NULL) GROUP BY ROLE_ID) A ON INSTR(B.ROLEIDS,A.ROLE_ID)>0 WHERE B.ID NOT IN (SELECT MANAGER_ID FROM COMPANY_INFO WHERE ID = ?) AND B.COMPANY_ID = ?
